name: CLASI - Community Learning About Security Issues
body:
### Welcome to CLASI.
CLASI, or community learning about security issues, is a github project designed to help programmers learn about security issues.
[Coverity Scan Results](https://scan.coverity.com/projects/clasi)
![Coverity Scan Build Status](https://scan.coverity.com/projects/8891/badge.svg)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
